itunes:title: Episode 461 - A Thoughtful Gun Debate With Graham Allen
title: Episode 461 - A Thoughtful Gun Debate With Graham Allen
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome Rant Nation's Graham Allen live from Texas to discuss the shootings in El Paso and Dayton over the weekend and whether or not America has a gun problem or a mental health problem.  We also discuss Tucker Carlson be...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome Rant Nation's Graham Allen live from Texas to discuss the shootings in El Paso and Dayton over the weekend and whether or not America has a gun problem or a mental health problem.  We also discuss Tucker Carlson being under fire for saying white supremacy is a hoax and Joaquin Castro releasing all the names and businesses of Trump donors in San Antonio on his social media.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome Rant Nation's Graham Allen live from Texas to discuss the shootings in El Paso and Dayton over the weekend and whether or not America has a gun problem or a mental health problem.  We also discuss Tucker Carlson being under fire for saying white supremacy is a hoax and Joaquin Castro releasing all the names and businesses of Trump donors in San Antonio on his social media.

content:encoded:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome Rant Nation's Graham Allen live from Texas to discuss the shootings in El Paso and Dayton over the weekend and whether or not America has a gun problem or a mental health problem.  We also discuss Tucker Carlson being under fire for saying white supremacy is a hoax and Joaquin Castro releasing all the names and businesses of Trump donors in San Antonio on his social media.
